content.body: Random question. In Chrome devtools "Pause on uncaught exceptions" there's a prediction system involved right? https://jsfiddle.net/qn978wxu/3/ I noticed Firefox correctly handles the second case with Promise.race and knows the promise is caught. Is this a performance thing? I can't seem to find much about it. Simply passing reject into the setTimeout doesn't cause Chrome devtools to break. littledan Did you ever work on something like this?
